group_1.narration: We don't have much time left until the show.@Gotta just knuckle down and do our best.

group_1.textRight: Alina-senpai...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah?

group_1.textRight: Thank you...
I figured out what you were trying to tell@me...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, you did?

group_1.textRight: So I won't be coming to Manga Club for a@while...

group_1.textLeft: That has nothing to do with me. I'm in the@Art Club.

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah, I know that...

group_1.textLeft: Here you go.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What's this...

group_1.textLeft: Don't you need the costume designs?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I do! I really do! Thank you so, so@much!

group_1.textLeft: With that, I, Alina, am no longer part of@your little project.
So long.

group_1.textRight: See you!

group_1.textLeft: So you want me to make these costumes?

group_1.textRight: I heard you've got the nimblest fingers out@of all the Magical Girls we know!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]You're not wrong.
Leave the designs to me.
I'll wow everyone with my sense of flair!@You can count on me!

group_1.textRight: Um, actually, we already have the designs!@Just make them as they're drawn here!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
Oh...really?
I wouldn't want you to have any regrets... @I could just make some small—

group_1.textRight: I want them like they are in the pictures!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]O-oh... Okay...

group_1.textRight: Thanks for your help!
Can you have them done by this date?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What's with the tight schedule?!
You want me to make smoke effects?

group_1.textRight: Yes please! I want it to be all billowy and@cool!

group_1.textLeft: Ya know, there's all kinds of machines that@do that kinda stuff...

group_1.textRight: Oh, hmm, I could just use a bunch of@barbecue grills to generate smoke!

group_1.textLeft: (Nothing more dangerous than a resourceful@idiot. Can't take your eye off them...)
(I have plenty of experience with kids all @the time during my workshops...)
Well, all right.
I'll lend you a little of my expertise!

group_1.textRight: Thanks!

group_1.textLeft: This is the lighting sequence, and this is@the map of the switchboard, right?
I get it.
I'm sorry I had to turn down the role, but@I'd be glad to help backstage!

group_1.textRight: Thanks so much!

group_1.narration: ―Kyoko―@Pathetic knight! You've meddled@in our affairs for too long!
―Kyoko―@Now this is what you call@fightin' a losing battle.
―Sasara―@Gngh... Not here, not after I got this far.
―Sasara―@I'm sorry, Karin. I thought I had@the strength to fight for you...
―Yachiyo―@Now you will see the true power@of my magical artifacts...
―Felicia―@Moo moo moooooo!@We're gonna suck up all your energy!
―Yachiyo―@Now. Prepare yourself. How will you survive@this, Knight?
―Felicia―@Mooo moo moo! Your... Your...@Um... What's the next line?
―Karin―@Oh, come on! I was just@about to make my BIG entrance!
―Felicia―@I did! I just can't read this word!
―Karin―@Look it up in the dictionary, then!

group_1.textRight: Still, I think we've just about perfected@everything except this one scene, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo, If you could just read the lines@with a little more...um...passion...

group_1.textRight: Fear not...
I'm sure I'm the type who knocks it out of@the park for the real thing.

group_1.textLeft: All right, we're all done with the set@pieces!

group_1.textRight: Whew... I haven't worked this hard in ages...
I'm used to hunting Witches, but this is@different.

group_1.textLeft: All of the hard work we're putting into this@play will to be worth it.
I can't wait to see it!

group_1.textRight: Thanks a ton, you guys!

group_1.narration: Just like that, we all came together@and built all the props we need.@Then we just practiced and practiced...

group_1.textCenter: (I bought a whole bunch of candy and snacks@to pass out to the kids.)

group_1.textRight: My, my, what are all those snacks for?

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna hand them out to the kids after@the play ends tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: You're planning to do all that?
Now I'm even more excited for the show.

group_1.textLeft: Me too, Grandma!
I promise, it's gonna be a show no one will@ever forget!
I know for sure I won't...
